rules_text:
Flying
{1}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a Weapon token. [i](It's an Equipment with equip {2} and “Equipped creature gets +1/+1.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]The Warkrei military utilizes thousands of birds of prey. While chiefly serving as scouts, it would be unwise to ignore their true nature.[/i]
